name: KiwiDesignSystem V1.2 Freebie
description:
Okay.


We got carried away and now we have over 1000 buttons in our 8 themed design system. Who needs these many buttons? We don’t know. But buttons are not the only ones. We are talking about:

  • 272 input bars
  • 40 (meh) input boxes
  • 136 input numbers
  • over 300 dropdowns spread over 3 types
  • want your selection elements? you get 132 checks, radios and toggles
  • unfortunately only some measly 55 rating elements
  • you have your date picker, then your time picker, and then your date and time picker (44 of them)
  • 176 segments for you alternative navigation lovers, along with another 176 tabs
  • 90 header and 55 vertical menus
  • moving on to displaying data, we have over 500 avatars, badges and avatar badge combos
  • 264 chips
  • 80 messages
  • 88 tooltips
  • 540 popovers (We really don’t know what happened here)
  • 396 popconfirms (they just kept coming)
  • 22 notifications (thank God)
  • 66 sliders
  • 128 progress bar
  • and 11 modals, phew


All wrapped up in over 100 design blocks and 48 UI examples.


So if you ever find yourself in need of a buttload of components, variants, styles and more.. well, you’re already here, you might as well give the demo a go and preview the full version here.


We’re still making sense of this monstrosity, but as we fine tune and build more examples we’ll keep adding more to be accessed via the free version. For now you’ll get your 1000 buttons design system along with more than 120+ text, color and effects styles. Oh, and 280+ icons too! These can be previewed in action in several landing page design blocks and templates.


Help us reign this beast in and give us your thoughts below about what you’d like to see in the future!


Learn more at our website: kiwisystems.io
